name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior ML Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Python**, **PyTorch**, **multilingual TTS**, **neural TTS**, and **speech synthesis**. Proven expertise in deploying ML models with **Kubeflow**, **MLflow**, and using **Ray** for scalable compute tasks. Skilled in integrating systems with **Kafka**, **Redis**, and working with databases like **PostgreSQL** and data formats such as **Parquet**. Proficient in converting models to optimized formats with **ONNX** and **TensorRT** for enhanced performance.

Strong background in full stack development, with hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing, while ensuring adherence to compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Adept in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines.
